answers.answer: Hi Shaft, Well sorry for your ED but that is to do with diabetes and the meds you are on, if you think you have a prostate problem get back to the docs and ask for a rectal exam, he should know from that.Your dk red sperm may be from bleedin from your prostate.Hope this helps.Good Luck

question: I am a 60yr old blk male w/type 1 diabete, hbp, and high colestorel I have experienced ED for over 7 yrs and dk red sperm for over 2yrs.  I have seen a urologist w/no concrete results.  I have had hepc over 6 yrs ago and undrwent intrefuron treatment for 1yr.  I believe I have enlarged prostate also.  once in a while I feel a pull in my groin area, but not often.     any suggestions  I am on meds for all my ailments.  and see my doctor every 3 mos.   is he missing something???    I aint getting any younger!!!This discussion is related to/posts/Mens-Health/dark-color-of-ejaculation/show/183088.
title: sperm color
